Definition: Short product name without brand or size details
Complete product name including brand product name and size
Second-level product categorization within the main category
Third-level product categorization - most granular product type classification
Market positioning tier or price segment
Consumer-facing brand name as displayed to consumers
Parent company or umbrella brand (may be the same as brand or a larger umbrella brand)
Canadian province where product is sold
Legal name of the product supplier/manufacturer (official registered business name)
Number of individual packs per case for wholesale ordering (stores order in cases)
Number of units per individual pack (consumers purchase in packs)
Examples: 15 capsules per bottle, 1 cartridge per pack

Definition: Weight of a single unit in grams (often NULL for oils/capsules populated for vapes and flower)
Total weight per pack calculated as pack_size * unit_weight (NULL when unit_weight is NULL)
